price: Kuma ne, lalle haƙĩƙa, Mun halakar da abin da yake kẽwayenku na alƙaryu kuma Muka jujjũya ãyõyi, tsammãninsu zã su kõmo.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā mā ḥawlakum mina al-qurā waṣarrafnā al-āyāti laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
